name: An Annotated Reading List of Conversational AI
description: An annotated list of mostly academic papers on all the topics around Conversational AI. Created in 2018.

name: Designing Bots
description: This practical guide shows you how to design and build great conversational experiences and delightful bots that help people be more productive.

name: Designing Voice User Interfaces
description: Whether you are designing a mobile app, a toy, or a device such as a home assistant, this practical book guides you through basic VUI design principles, helps you choose the right speech recognition engine, and shows you how to measure your VUI's performance and improve upon it.

name: Alexa
description: Deploy your chatbot or virtual assistant as a skill to Amazon's cloud-based voice service Alexa.

name: LINE
description: Connect your chatbot to LINE and make use of their bot designer for prototyping needs.

name: Messenger
description: Enhance your Facebook Page experience by adding a chatbot through Messenger.

name: MS Teams
description: Make us of the MS Teams bot SDK and framework to turn your chatbot into an MS Teams app.

name: Slack
description: Reach your end users where they work by deploying your chatbot to Slack.

name: Telegram
description: Make use of the Telegram Bot API to easily connect your chatbot to Telegram.

name: WhatsApp
description: Use WhatsApp Business Platform APIs to connect bots with customers.

name: Conversation Design Institute
description: An institute, first of its kind (as far as I know), offering courses, certifications, and an annual conference on Conversational Design.

name: Creating AI Conversations Panel Series
description: Creating AI Conversations is a series of panel discussions that delve into the thinking, research, and process around crafting the personalities, conversations, and interactions of AI entities with people. Organized by Stanford MediaX.

name: SAP Conversational Experience Design
description: SAP Conversational Experience Design (SAP CxD) is a design language for enterprise conversational products. It provides guidelines and tools for designing conversational products that integrate seamlessly across business applications.

name: Voicebot.ai
description: Provides in one place the most important news, commentary, research, and analysis of voice technology.

name: Voiceflow
description: A conversation design tool for teams to design, prototype and launch voice & chat assistants.

name: Awesome Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing.

name: Awesome Machine Learning
description: A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries, and software (by language).

name: Awesome Natural Language Generation
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to Natural Language Generation.

name: Awesome NLP
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to Natural Language Processing.

name: Awesome NLP with Ruby
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to Natural Language Processing and text processing for Ruby.

name: The NLP Index
description: The NLP Index, a free and open-source code discovery tool, houses over 3000+ code repos. It includes the arxiv research paper PDF, ConnectedPapers link, and its GitHub repo.

name: Amazon Lex
description: An AWS service for building conversational interfaces for applications using voice and text.

name: Chai
description: Open-source platform for developers to build chatbots using Python and deploy them to the Chai mobile app.

name: Dasha
description: Conversational AI platform as a service with a strong focus on voice.

name: Dialogflow
description: Lifelike Conversational AI with state-of-the-art virtual agents by Google.

name: OpenDialog
description: OpenDialog enables you to design, develop and deploy conversational applications. Offers an open-source version and an Enterprise edition.

name: Rasa
description: A platform to create virtual assistants at scale. Offers an open-source version and an Enterprise edition.

name: SAP Conversational AI
description: An end-to-end chatbot building platform from SAP. Comes with a free Community edition and an Enterprise edition.
